tool_description: An API That Shows Climate Change News All Over The World
name: Climate Change Informatio
title: Climate Change Informatio

api_list.name: Get Individual News_copy
api_list.description: This will get the  Climate Change Information from specific resources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-informatio.p.rapidapi.com/news/bcc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-informatio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-informatio.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-informatio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Climate Change Information
api_list.description: This end point  will return back Climate Change Information from all over the world
